input.sentences: we went to a beachside seafood restaurant for dinner .
they offered many fresh options of locally caught seafood .
the shrimp were so fresh and delicious .
we had fresh flounder for our entree and i 've never had better .
we will be returning to location on future visits to this area .
output.sentences: Taking a stroll at the beach lead us to a fantastic night out at a seafood restaurant.
There were so many seafood options to pick from.
I just had to try their shrimp because i have heard its really fresh.
Another suggestion was to try their flounder which didn't disappoint.
This will definitely be a place I will return to.
